abstract: Egyptian steel tycoon Ahmed Ezz, who epitomized cronyism and corruption in Egypt during reign of Pres Hosni Mubarak, is disqualified from running for Parliament.
lead_paragraph: The steel tycoon who came to epitomize cronyism and corruption in Egypt during the era of President Hosni Mubarak was disqualified after he had failed to submit financial statements from one of his wives, according to a judicial official.

headline.main: Panel Disqualifies Egyptian Tycoon From Parliamentary Bid
headline.print_headline: Panel Disqualifies Egyptian Tycoon From Parliamentary Bid

snippet: The steel tycoon who came to epitomize cronyism and corruption in Egypt during the era of President Hosni Mubarak was disqualified after he had failed to submit financial statements from one of his wives, according to a judicial official.
